org.robolectric.shadows
Class ShadowDisplay

java.lang.Object
  org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowDisplay

@Implements(value=android.view.Display.class)
public class ShadowDisplay
extends Object

A shadow for Display with some reasonable defaults
